"The Island of Lost Things" - A fantasy novel where a group of strangers find themselves stranded on an island where lost objects from throughout history have washed up. As she delves deeper into the past, she must confront the complexities of love, loss, and identity.

"The Department of Unlikely Solutions" - A comedy series where a group of bumbling bureaucrats are tasked with solving the world's most absurd and impossible problems.
